temperature_c.description: Temperature in Celsius. Absolute minimum is -273°C, maximum safe operational limit is 1200°C

pressure_psi.description: Pressure in PSI. Must be non-negative, maximum safe operational limit is 3000 PSI

ph.description: pH scale ranges from 0 (highly acidic) to 14 (highly basic)

voltage_v.description: Voltage in Volts. Maximum safe operational limit is 1000V

concentration_m.description: Molarity (M) concentration. Maximum safe limit is 10M

rpm.description: Rotations per minute for centrifuges or stirrers
